page.title: 17A DAY AT SPAXTON SCHOOL
page.content: I arrive at school at about five to nine. The bell goes at nine and we go into the classroom.Mrs Bryant calls the register.Then we line up for assembly which lasts for about twenty minutes. When we come back to the classroom usually on Tuesday we do our spellings. When we have done our spellings Group 1 and 2 do Basic English and Groups 3 and 4 do Scottish Maths until play time. At 11.00 we do country dancing then our Group work again. At 11.55 we pack up for dinner. Our classroom is used as the dining room. A lady called Mrs Barks comes to look after us. Each table has a leader.We start work at 1.10 with project and reading.During playtime we change for swimming. There are three Groups according to how good they are. Back in the classroom we say a prayer then we say Good after noon.
